divs: Sighting DetailsI was ridding my bike to go to the store to get something to eat when i stopped my bike to take a breather. I looked up and i saw this very big triangle shaped object headed NE it was going really slow and was moving over a building. I was shocked to have witnessed a UFO flying so slowly i thought to my self I better get out of the area but something made me stay like it was Important so i stayed until i couldn't see the object anymore
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Surrey
There were no other sightings in Surrey on or around April 26th 2013
